overview: Cathy brings a wealth of experience in consumer and business marketing and business management to the JumpStart team. She joins JumpStart after four years at American Greetings, where she had a series of brand and business management roles, including Director of the American Greetings brand (within the $1.5 billion greeting card business) and Director of Innovation. As Director of Innovation, Cathy led a team in developing and launching a new product, eventually taking over management of the product as it developed into an $80 million annual business. Prior to American Greetings, Cathy worked extensively in branding, marketing and communications management at The Coca-Cola Company and Procter and Gamble, where she focused on brand development for both mature businesses, such as Coca-Cola classic, Barqâ€™s, and Crest, and start-up companies, including Full Throttle. Prior to her consumer marketing experiences, Cathy dedicated six years to the commercial banking industry, holding a series of positions at Bank of America. Her most recent experience was serving the dynamic Northern Virginia middle market business community, providing financial support to enterprises with up to $250 million in annual revenues. Cathy was a Keller Scholar and received an MBA with a focus in Marketing from Duke University in 1998. She earned an undergraduate degree in Economics from Davidson College in 1990.
